citations.narrative:
Six outdoor runs had exposed sharp points on metal fence sections. These were within reach of the enclosed dogs, and
could pose a possible injury risk to the animals. Enclosures must be maintained to prevent appearance of sharp points
and edges, and these must be repaired as needed.
Corrected at the time of inspection.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee.
End Section

narrative:
3.6(a)(2)(i) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
Six outdoor runs had exposed sharp points on metal fence sections.  These were within reach of the enclosed dogs, and 
could pose a possible injury risk to the animals.  Enclosures must be maintained to prevent appearance of sharp points 
and edges, and these must be repaired as needed. 
Corrected at the time of inspection. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee. 
 
End Section
